section.title: Description
section.para: This component defines a subtree of the component tree as draggable for drag-and-drop operations. Within such a "drag zone," you can click the mouse button on an item and drag it to any component that supports drop operations (a "drop zone"). It encodes all the necessary JavaScript for supporting drag-and-drop operations.

itemizedlist.listitem: Encodes all necessary JavaScript to perform drag actions
Can be used within any component type that provides the required properties for drag operations
